channel.title: Feeling Responsive
channel.description: Feeling Responsive is built on the fabulous Foundation Framework and comes with lots of features to show your content right.

item.title: Possibilites to style your Post
item.description:
Subtitles

Feature Images

Header Images

You can choose to show a special full-width header image or not.

Meta-Data

item.title: The Grid
item.description:
Feeling Responsive is built on Foundation. And of course, we make use of the wonderful grid system and so can you. Find out more about constructing beautiful layouts in the foundation documentation.

Large Displays

Two Columns

Three Columns

Four Columns
